tool.name: Stanford Dependency Parser
tool.description: (standalone) Generate a dependency parse of unannotated text
tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates a dependency parse of text in a LIF container using the `Stanford Core NLP tools <https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/>`_.
**Required Annotations**
* None
**Generated Annotations**
A LIF document containing:
1. `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token>`_ annotations (with part of speech) #. `DependencyStructure <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/DependencyStructure>`_ annotations #. `Dependency <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Dependency>`_ annotations
**License**
Stanford CoreNLP is licensed under `the GNU General Public License <https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/#license>`_.
